snippet: The Obama administration accused former President Ali Abdullah Saleh of undermining “stability” in Yemen by backing a rebel group that recently took control of its capital.
abstract: United States imposes sanctions on former Yemeni Pres Ali Abdullah Saleh; Obama administration has accused Saleh of being supporter of violence perpetrated by Houthis, rebel group that took control of the capital in September.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration accused former President Ali Abdullah Saleh of undermining “stability” in Yemen by backing a rebel group that recently took control of its capital.

headline.main: U.S. Imposes Sanctions on Yemen’s Ex-President and 2 Rebel Leaders
headline.print_headline: Yemen: U.S. Sanctions Imposed on Ex-President and 2 Rebels
